title: Why Trust Whiteboard Consultants For Your Canadian Ambition?
description: As the top study in Canada consultants in Kolkata, we provide tailored guidance to navigate Canada's welcoming education system and immigration pathways.

features.text: Expert guidance on the Student Direct Stream (SDS) visa process.
In-depth knowledge of Designated Learning Institutions (DLIs).
High success rate for Canadian study permit applications.
Personalized advice on securing a GIC and proving financial support.
Comprehensive test preparation for IELTS & TOEFL.
Guidance on the Post-Graduation Work Permit (PGWP) and pathways to PR.

image.alt: A team of education consultants collaborating on study in Canada applications
